title: it doesn't have to do anything with the game, it's just about my pc
body: hi, i'm new in this game and my pc was working fine until i reached level 14, my pc started to lag a bit and i had to leave matches early due to drop fps, the game penalized me and i won't be able to get loot boxes or capsules after i level up because of that... it's really unfair, i have nothing to do about it, it's my pc it wasn't my decision.  is there anything to do about it?

replies.body:
Everyone is missing a point here

Press Esc ingame

Go to video

Turn all graphic settings down to LOW or OFF

100% 60 fps - 40 fps GG

Default its on high or medium

Just make a new account, takes about 5% of the time.

Also consider getting a PC under 10 years old.
is it a big deal if i don't get capsules and loot boxes after leveling up?

Yes, those are your only way to get any content.

I cant imagine how many times you would have to leave games for that, though.
New account is needed if you wish to have a pleasant experience in league of legends.
Your best bet is to send a support ticket and hope.
